pgftikz-error-title: Generic title message displayed before the actual reported error
pgftikz-error-emptyinput: Displayed when parsing input and finding no text between <PGFTikZ> tags.
pgftikz-error-imagelineparse: Displayed when extraction of filename from image entry line (e.g. [[:File:Filename.png]]) failed.
pgftikz-error-apigetpagecontent: Displayed when API call to get existing file failed.
pgftikz-error-apiedit: Displayed when API call failed to edit wikipage associated with uploaded image.
pgftikz-error-apidelete: Displayed when API call to delete preview wikipage.
pgftikz-error-nonpgffile: Displayed when a file with the target name was found, but the PGFTikZ header was not found (possibly a non PGFTikZ-generated file).
pgftikz-error-tmpdircreate: Displayed when temporary folder creation failed.
pgftikz-error-texfilecreate: Error displayed when creation of LaTeX source file failed.
pgftikz-error-latexnoout: Error displayed when call to LaTeX failed and produced no text output.
pgftikz-error-latexcompil: Error displayed when call to LaTeX failed to compile (compilation log follows).
pgftikz-error-dvipsnoout: Error displayed when a call to dvips failed and produced no text output.
pgftikz-error-dvipscompil: Error displayed when a call to dvips failed to produce image (error message follows).
pgftikz-error-epstoolnoout: Error displayed when a call to epstool failed and produced no text output.
pgftikz-error-epstoolrun: Error displayed when a call to epstool failed to produce image (error message follows).
pgftikz-error-convertnoout: Error displayed when a call to convert (imagemagick) failed and produced no text output.
pgftikz-error-convertrun: Error displayed when a call to convert (imagemagick) failed to produce an image (error message follows).
pgftikz-error-ghostscriptnoout: Error displayed when a call to ghostscript failed and produced no text output.
pgftikz-error-ghostscriptrun:
Error displayed when a call to ghostscript failed to produce an image (error message follows).

The parenthesis "runtime" is the technical term for "when running ghostscript": you can drop it if there is no such term in your language.
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_empty: Error displayed when upload failed (empty file).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_missing: Error displayed when upload failed (filetype missing).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_badtype: Error displayed when upload failed (bad filetype).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_tooshort: Error displayed when upload failed (filename too short).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_illegal: Error displayed when upload failed (illegal filename).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_overwrit: Error displayed when upload failed (trying to overwrite an existing file when disabled by setup).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_verify: Error displayed when upload failed (verification error).  $1 gives details on the error.
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_hook: Error displayed when upload failed (hook aborted).
pgftikz-error-uploadlocal_error_unknown: Error displayed when upload failed (unknown error).
